alert.note: Alert for Dickinson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 2:39PM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River near Milford. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, significant amounts of pasture and other farm lands begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by midday Friday and to crest near 13.7 ft on Monday. Additional rises are possible thereafter. The timing and magnitude of the crest will be highly dependent on the amount of rain received late Thursday into Friday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Little Sioux River Milford 12.0 11.3 Wed 1 pm 11.4 12.2 13.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 445 PM CDT.
